text: Watashi ga dōshite, anata gata no sūhai suru mono o osoreyou ka. Kare ga nani no ken'nō mo sadzuke rarenai mono o, anata gata wa osorezu ni arrā ni nabete agamete irude wanai ka. Sorede ryōgun (isshinkyō to tashinkyō) no dochiraga, motto heian o eru ni ataisuru no ka. Anata gataga moshi shitte irunara (kotae nasai)
